thought: To craft yellow stained glass, I need to craft 8 glass blocks and then dye them yellow. I need to start by placing the sand in the crafting grid, so I will move the sand from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
